parameters.doc: true if the normals should be normalized

elements.name: TestFrustumPoint

elements.name: TestFrustumOBB
elements.brief: Tests intersection between a frustum and an orient...
elements.description: Tests intersection between a frustum and an oriented bounding box (OBB)

returnvalues.name: intersects
returnvalues.doc: Returns true if the objects intersect

parameters.name: frustum
parameters.doc: the frustum

parameters.name: world
parameters.doc: The world transform of the OBB

parameters.name: aabb_min
parameters.doc: the minimum corner of the object. In local space.

parameters.name: aabb_max
parameters.doc: the maximum corner of the object. In local space.

parameters.name: skip_near_far
parameters.doc: if true, the near+far planes of the frustum are ignored
